description:
All plans go into action as the moment of the wedding arrives - but as the veil is lifted on Pudding`s grotesque face, all hell breaks loose and unexpected circumstances mean chaos breaks out at the altar! Meanwhile, Luffy charges in, adding to the mayhem!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Deadly Kiss! The Mission to Assassinate the Emperor Kicks Off!
Ein tödlicher Kuss – Der Startschuss zum Attentat auf die Kaiserin!
Le baiser de la mort. Le début du plan d`assassinat d`un Yonkou !
Shi no Kiss: Yonkou Ansatsu Sakusen Kaishi!
Смертельный поцелуй! Начало плана по убийству Йонко!
死のキス 四皇暗殺作戦開始!
